mapper.select: select distinct count(*) from frip_review r, frip_class c, frip_option o,frip_booking b where r.review_classNum in (select class_num from frip_class where frip_class.class_memnum = #{mem_num}) and r.review_classnum = c.class_num and r.review_writer = b.booking_writer and b.booking_option = o.option_num

select * from (select distinct r.*,c.class_title, c.class_startdate, o.option_name, m.mem_name, row_number() over(order by review_num) rnum from frip_review r, frip_class c, frip_option o,frip_booking b,frip_member m where r.review_classNum in (select class_num from frip_class where frip_class.class_memnum = #{mem_num}) and r.review_classnum = c.class_num and r.review_writer = b.booking_writer and b.booking_option = o.option_num and m.mem_num = r.review_writer order by review_num desc) where rnum >= #{dto.startNo} and rnum <= #{dto.endNo}
select * from frip_review where review_classnum in (select class_num from frip_class where class_memnum = #{mem_num})
